title: Of Wolves and Witches and Fireballs in the Sky
description: A selection of fairy tales, retold:"Of Wolves" (Little Red Riding Hood)Someone walks with Ysabeau in the forest. Is he a wolf or only a man?"Of Witches" (The Witch of the Woods)Samuel's lost in the woods until a witch finds him. If she has her way, he'll never go home."Of Fireballs in the Sky" (Hansel and Gretel)After the great wars, a family of four lives in the Melted City, scavenging for food. There's never enough.(Contains violence and explicit sexuality; intended for mature readers)
author: Klaudia Bara
